House_Tyrell.name: House Tyrell
coat of arms: A golden rose, on a green field
Vert, a rose or
title: High Steward of Highgarden

Lord of Highgarden
Lord Paramount of the Mander
Defender of the Marches
High Marshal of the Reach
Warden of the South

House_Ambrose.name: House Ambrose
coat of arms: A yellow field strewn with red ants
(Or, sem  of ants gules)

House_Appleton.name: House Appleton
coat of arms: Quarterly: An apple tree on yellow, a grey gatehouse on white
(Quarterly, first and fourth or, an apple tree proper, second and third argent, a gatehouse cendr e)

House_Ashford.name: House Ashford
coat of arms: A white sun-and-chevron on orange
(Tenn , beneath a chevron inverted a sun-in-splendour argent)
House_Ashford.title: Lord of Ashford

House_Beesbury.name: House Beesbury
House_Beesbury.coat of arms: Paly or and sable, on a pale of the last three beehives of the first
House_Beesbury.title: Lord of Honeyholt[1]

House_Caswell.name: House Caswell
House_Caswell.coat of arms: Argent, a centaur with bow or
title: Lord of Bitterbridge
Defender of the Fords

House_Cockshaw.name: House Cockshaw
House_Cockshaw.coat of arms: Sable, three feathers in fess gules argent and or

House_Cordwayner.name: House Cordwayner
coat of arms: Black boots on field of green and gold diamonds
(Lozengy vert and or, a pair of boots sable)

House_Costayne.name: House Costayne
coat of arms: Quartered: a silver chalice on black, a black rose on gold
(Quarterly, first and fourth sable, a chalice argent, second and third or, a rose of the first)
House_Costayne.title: Lord of the Three Towers[1]

House_Crane.name: House Crane
coat of arms: A vee of golden cranes on pale blue
(Bleu celeste, cranes in chevron or)

House_Cuy.name: House Cuy
coat of arms: Six yellow flowers on blue
(Azure, six flowers or)
House_Cuy.title: Lord of Sunflower Hall[1]

House_Florent.name: House Florent
coat of arms: A red fox in a circle of blue flowers on ermine
(Ermine, a fox gules within an annulet of flowers azure)
House_Florent.title: Lord of Brightwater Keep[1]

House_Footly.name: House Footly
coat of arms: A field of silver caltrops on black
(Sable, sem  of caltrops argent)
House_Footly.title: Lord of Tumbleton[1]

House_Graceford.name: House Graceford
coat of arms: The Mother's face upon white pale wavy dividing a brown field
(Brunâtre, on a pale wavy argent the Mother’s head caboshed proper)
House_Graceford.title: Lord of Holyhall[1]

House_Hightower.name: House Hightower
coat of arms: A white tower crowned with flames on smoke grey
(Cendr e, a tower argent, beacon inflamed gules)
title: Beacon of the South
Defender of Oldtown
Defender of the Citadel
King of the High Tower
(formerly)
Lord of Oldtown
Lord of the Hightower
Lord of the Port
Voice of Oldtown

House_Meadows.name: House Meadows
coat of arms: A border of flowers of many colors and varieties on green
(Vert, an orle of flowers variegated)
House_Meadows.title: Lord of Grassfield Keep[3]

House_Merryweather.name: House Merryweather
coat of arms: A golden horn of plenty spilling out apples, carrots, plums, onions, leeks, turnips, and fruits of many colors on a white field bordered in gold
(Argent, a cornucopia or overflowing with apples, carrots, plums, onions, leeks, turnips and fruits variegated all proper within a bordure of the second)
House_Merryweather.title: Lord of Longtable[2]

House_Mullendore.name: House Mullendore
coat of arms: Black-and-orange butterflies strewn over white
(Argent, sem  of butterflies sable and tenn )
House_Mullendore.title: Lord of Uplands[1]

(Tenn , three castles sable)
title: Lord of Starpike
Lord of Dunstonbury

House_Shermer.name: House Shermer
coat of arms: A field of copper nails on blue, a copper border rayonne
(Azure sem  of nails within a bordure rayonny copper)

House_Tarly.name: House Tarly
House_Tarly.coat of arms: Vert, a huntsman striding to dexter proper garbed gules
House_Tarly.title: Lord of Horn Hill
House_Tarly.founder: Herndon of the Horn and Harlon the Hunter

House_Vyrwel.name: House Vyrwel
coat of arms: A silver wyvern within a red double tressure on sable
(Sable, a wyvern argent within a double tressure gules)

House_Chester.name: House Chester
coat of arms: A green hand on a gold escutcheon on a green field, a border of red rayonne
(Vert, on an escutcheon or a hand of the field all within a bordure rayonny gules)
House_Chester.title: Lord of Greenshield[1] (stripped)

House_Grimm.name: House Grimm
coat of arms: An iron escutcheon with silver studs on a grey-green field strewn with longships proper
(Vert-cendr e sem  of longships proper, an escutcheon cendr e plat )
House_Grimm.title: Lord of Greyshield[1]

House_Hewett.name: House Hewett
coat of arms: Oaken escutcheon studded with iron, a field bendy of undulating blue and white
(Bendy undy azure and argent, an escutcheon brunâtre plat )
House_Hewett.seat: Deposed (formerly Lord Hewett's castle on Oakenshield)
House_Hewett.title: Lord of Oakenshield[1] (stripped)

House_Serry.name: House Serry
House_Serry.coat of arms: Argent, an escutcheon gules charged with a rose of the first all within a bordure embattled of the second
House_Serry.title: Lord of Southshield[1]

House_Ball.name: House Ball
coat of arms: Three white plates upon a chevron red on a white field
(Argent, on a chevron inverted gules three plates)

House_Bridges.name: House Bridges
coat of arms: A black stone bridge with three arches upon a golden chief above three blue pallets on white
(Argent, three pallets azure, on a chief or a stone bridge of three arches sable)

House_Bushy.name: House Bushy
coat of arms: A green fess embattled on white
(Argent, a fess embattled vert)

House_Dunn.name: House Dunn
coat of arms: Per pale black and pink, a countercharged two-headed pelican
(Per pale sable and rose, a pelican bicapitated counterchanged)

House_Graves.name: House Graves
coat of arms: Green and white gyronny, a double-headed eagle counter-charged, gold beak and talons
(Gyronny vert and argent, an eagle bicapitated counterchanged beaked and armed or)

House_Hastwyck.name: House Hastwyck
coat of arms: Barry olive and ivory
(Barry vert and argent)

House_Hunt.name: House Hunt
coat of arms: A brown deer, bound and slung on a pole, on white
(Argent, on a pole fesswise proper a deer bound and slung brunâtre)

House_Hutcheson.name: House Hutcheson
House_Hutcheson.coat of arms: Or, two bendlets between in base dexter a hand pointing to chief sinister, and in chief sinister a sun in splendour gules

House_Inchfield.name: House Inchfield
House_Inchfield.coat of arms: Cendr e, a bend sinister chequy sable and argent

House_Kidwell.name: House Kidwell
coat of arms: Pale green ivy bendy on black masonry
(Sable masoned proper bendy of ivy leaves vert)

House_Leygood.name: House Leygood
coat of arms: Three black thunderbolts on orange
(Tenn , three thunderbolts sable)

House_Lowther.name: House Lowther
coat of arms: A silver dolphin on a blue-green field
(Aquamarine, a dolphin argent)

House_Lyberr.name: House Lyberr
coat of arms: Per bend sinister: a grey cat's face on black, a brown jug on white
(Per bend sinister, in chief dexter sable, a cat’s head caboshed cendr e, in base sinister argent, a jug brunâtre)

House_Middlebury.name: House Middlebury
coat of arms: Quarterly, a black saltire on yellow, green and white diamonds
(Quarterly, first and fourth or, a saltire sable, second and third lozengy vert and argent)

House_Norridge.name: House Norridge
coat of arms: A flight of flaming arrows rising bendwise on a blue field
(Azure, a flight of arrows bendwise points to chief dexter inflamed proper)

House_Oldflowers.name: House Oldflowers
coat of arms: Ten white hands on green, 4-3-2-1, beneath a red bend sinister
(Vert, 10 hands 4-3-2-1 argent debruised by a bend sinister gules)

House_Orme.name: House Orme
coat of arms: Per fess: three golden harps on black, gold and silver bendy sinister
(Per fess, in chief sable, three harps or, in base bendy sinister of the second and argent)

House_Pommingham.name: House Pommingham
coat of arms: A red pomegranate on white, a double tressure red
(Argent, a pomegranate within a double tressure gules)

House_Redding.name: House Redding
coat of arms: A golden flagon on burgundy within a border of gold and white checks
(Murrey, a flagon or within a bordure chequy of the second and argent)

House_Rhysling.name: House Rhysling
coat of arms: An oaken door banded with iron, in a grey stone doorway, on black masonry
(Sable masoned proper, an door brunâtre banded cendr e within a stone doorway of the last)

House_Risley.name: House Risley
coat of arms: A black knight on a black rearing horse on white, bearing a golden lance and a white shield, upon which is seen the above in miniature
(Argent, a knight mounted upon a horse forcen  sable bearing a lance or and a shield of the field itself charged with the whole)
title: Knight of Risley Glade
(formerly)
Lord of
Risley Glade

House_Roxton.name: House Roxton
House_Roxton.coat of arms: Bleu celeste, per saltire a chain of rings Or

House_Sloane.name: House Sloane
coat of arms: Per pale, white stars strewn on indigo, an orange sun on yellow
(Per pale, in dexter purpure sem  of mullets argent, in sinister or, a sun-in-splendour tenn )

House_Uffering.name: House Uffering
coat of arms: Oak and iron paly, beneath a white chief with seven green hands
(Paly brunâtre and cendr e, on a chief argent seven hands vert)

House_Webber.name: House Webber
House_Webber.coat of arms: Sable, a cobweb argent thereon a spider gules
House_Webber.title: Lord of Coldmoat

House_Westbrook.name: House Westbrook
coat of arms: Two green bars gemmel on gold
(Or, two bars-gemels vert)

House_Willum.name: House Willum
coat of arms: Three silver longswords crossed on black beneath a dragonbone skeleton on a white chief
(Sable, three longswords crossed argent, on a chief of the second a dragonbone skeleton proper)

House_Woodwright.name: House Woodwright
House_Woodwright.coat of arms: A red pall on a field of oak

House_Wythers.name: House Wythers
coat of arms: A grey squirrel on white with a red border
(Argent, a squirrel argent within a bordure gules)

House_Yelshire.name: House Yelshire
House_Yelshire.coat of arms: Barry vert and Or, on a chief sable a battering-ram proper headed Or

House_Osgrey.name: House Osgrey
House_Osgrey.coat of arms: Argent, a lion rampant chequy vert and or
title: Knight of Standfast
